Query.SQL: SELECT COUNT(*), NVL(SUM(SECONDS_IN_WAIT),0) FROM GV$SESSION WHERE LOCKWAIT IS NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(*), SUM(SECONDS_IN_WAIT), EVENT, U.NAME, O.NAME FROM GV$SESSION S , SYS.OBJ$ O, SYS.USER$ U WHERE U.USER# = O.OWNER# AND S.ROW_WAIT_OBJ# = O.OBJ# AND LOCKWAIT IS NOT NULL GROUP BY EVENT, U.NAME, O.NAME
SELECT COUNT(*), SUM(SECONDS_IN_WAIT), USERNAME FROM GV$SESSION WHERE LOCKWAIT IS NOT NULL GROUP BY USERNAME

SELECT a.USERNAME BLOCKED_USER, upper(to_multi_byte(substr(a.machine, instr(a.machine,'\', 1) + 1, length(a.machine)))) BLOCKED_MACHINE, b.USERNAME BLOCKING_USER, upper(to_multi_byte(substr(b.machine, instr(b.machine,'\', 1) + 1, length(b.machine)))) BLOCKING_MACHINE, u.name || '/' || T1.NAME || '/' || A.EVENT LOCK_CONDITION, SUM(W.CTIME) BLOCKED_TIME, COUNT(*) BLOCK_COUNT FROM GV$LOCK W, GV$LOCK H, GV$SESSION A, GV$SESSION B, GV$LOCKED_OBJECT O, sys.obj$ T1, sys.user$ u WHERE H.LMODE != 0 AND W.REQUEST != 0 AND W.TYPE = H.TYPE AND W.ID1 = H.ID1 AND W.ID2 = H.ID2 AND B.SID = H.SID AND B.INST_ID = H.INST_ID AND A.SID = W.SID AND A.INST_ID = W.INST_ID AND H.SID = O.SESSION_ID AND H.INST_ID = O.INST_ID AND O.OBJECT_ID = T1.OBJ# AND U.USER# = t1.owner# AND EXISTS ( SELECT SID FROM GV$SESSION VS WHERE LOCKWAIT IS NOT NULL ) GROUP BY a.USERNAME, b.USERNAME, U.NAME, T1.NAME, A.EVENT, upper(to_multi_byte(substr(a.machine, instr(a.machine,'\', 1) + 1, length(a.machine)))), upper(to_multi_byte(substr(b.machine, instr(b.machine,'\', 1) + 1, length(b.machine))))

By Blocked User|Blocked User-{0}|Blocked Machine-{1}|Blocking User-{2}|Blocking Machine-{3}|Lock Condition-{4}

Query.SQL: SELECT a.USERNAME BLOCKED_USER, upper(to_multi_byte(substr(a.machine, instr(a.machine,'\', 1) + 1, length(a.machine)))) BLOCKED_MACHINE, a.inst_id BLOCKED_RAC_NODE, a.SID BLOCKED_SESSION, aas.SQL_TEXT BLOCKED_SQL, b.USERNAME BLOCKING_USER, upper(to_multi_byte(substr(b.machine, instr(b.machine,'\', 1) + 1, length(b.machine)))) BLOCKING_MACHINE, b.inst_id BLOCKING_RAC_NODE, b.SID BLOCKING_SESSION, bs.SQL_TEXT BLOCKING_SQL, u.name || '.' || T1.NAME BLOCKED_OBJECT, A.EVENT LOCK_CONDITION, W.CTIME BLOCKED_TIME FROM GV$LOCK W, GV$LOCK H, GV$SESSION A, GV$SESSION B, GV$LOCKED_OBJECT O, sys.obj$ T1, sys.user$ u , GV$SQL aas, GV$SQL bs WHERE H.LMODE != 0 AND W.REQUEST != 0 AND W.TYPE = H.TYPE AND W.ID1 = H.ID1 AND W.ID2 = H.ID2 AND B.SID = H.SID AND B.INST_ID = H.INST_ID AND A.SID = W.SID AND A.INST_ID = W.INST_ID AND H.SID = O.SESSION_ID AND H.INST_ID = O.INST_ID AND O.OBJECT_ID = T1.OBJ# AND A.SQL_ADDRESS = aas.ADDRESS AND B.PREV_SQL_ADDR = bs.ADDRESS AND U.USER# = t1.owner# AND EXISTS ( SELECT SID FROM GV$SESSION VS WHERE LOCKWAIT IS NOT NULL ) ORDER BY BLOCKED_TIME DESC, BLOCKED_USER, BLOCKING_USER
